title: One of a kind 2 Bdrm Loft - Off St Parking - Walk to T
posting_body: ['THE STANDARD MODERN RESIDENCES', '- LUXURY one of a kind 2 bedroom unit with loft', '- Walk to Commuter rail', '3d tours of the unit can be viewed from the link below:', '<URL>', '- Large unit with loft space located on the second level.', '- Modern open floor plans.', '- Real Brazilian Cherry Hardwood Flooring throughout.', '- High vaulted ceilings.', '- Exposed brick in bedrooms.', '- Fully plastered walls and ceilings', '- Designer Kitchens made with real wood, granite counter-tops, lazy susans, spice racks, 42" upper cabinets for extra storage, tile backsplashes, pull out spray faucets, and under-mount sinks.', '- Stainless steel appliances: Refrigerator, dishwasher, built-in microwave, stove/oven', '- LED Lighting throughout (never change another light bulb again), modern track lighting and fixtures.', '- Real wood, solid core stained doors and trim throughout.', '- Secure building with key fobs for all residents.', '- The building has 24/7 surveillance cameras in all common areas.', '- Fully tiled bathrooms with ample storage space and separate linen closet.', '- Ample closet space and additional storage space in unit.', '- State of the art Heating ventilation and air conditioning with on-demand hot water, central heat and air conditioning in every unit.', 'Extremely efficient units mean low utility bills.', '- Smart W-Fi thermostats ensure you are comfortable while you are home and saving money when you are not.', '- LED intercom system and integrated camera system within every unit.', '- On-site cloud-based laundry room.', '- Package delivery system for building and package/mail room ensure you will never miss another delivery again.', '- Off street parking for all residents, with additional parking available.', '- Internet and cable ready.', '- Close proximity to highway 24, shopping and other amenities.', '- Professionally managed.', '- Full-time maintenance and emergency maintenance.', '- This is non-smoking building.', '- No pets.']
